about_the_game:
Get ready for the excitement of Jet Soccer, a fun sports game that puts a fresh spin on soccer. You're in control of a special flying machine, zipping around in action-packed matches. Perform quick moves, speedy dashes, and cool dives to outsmart your rivals and score amazing goals.



Each flying machine has its own unique feel. Some might be bigger, quicker, or better at turning, letting you pick the one that's just right for you. Matches unfold in colorful, simple-shaped arenas that ensure the action is fast-paced and engaging.

You can play Jet Soccer all on your own, or you can get your friends in on the fun. The game lets you play with friends right at home or connect with players from around the world. It's super easy to join a game or start your own.

The game also allows for player customization; choose your aircraft's paint pattern and color scheme to make it truly your own. Jet Soccer combines simple yet engaging mechanics with a distinctive art style and a competitive spirit, making it an unmissable experience for sports game enthusiasts and party game lovers alike.

Join the action in Jet Soccer and take your fun to new heights!

name: Jet Soccer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Jet Soccer delivers thrilling, physics-based soccer matches. Steer your aircraft, perform swift maneuvers, and score epic goals in minimalist, yet vivid arenas! Enjoy competitive fun with friends locally or online.
